prompt: <description>Part 1: Rectangular Prism with a Curved Top Edge Construct a rectangular prism with a curved top edge. Begin by creating a new coordinate system. Sketch The sketch will be made up of two faces, each with one loop. Face 1 will contain a circle, and face 2 will contain four curves: one line and three arcs. Face 1 For face 1, create a new loop and within that loop, create a circle. The circle's center should be at [0.0357, 0.1403] and its radius should be 0.0357. Face 2 For face 2, create a new loop. Within that loop, create the following curves: 1. Line 1: Start point at [0.029, 0.1052] and end point at [0.5804, 0.0]. 2. Arc 1: Start point at [0.5804, 0.0], mid point at [0.75, 0.1403], and end point at [0.5804, 0.2806]. 3. Line 2: Start point at [0.5804, 0.2806] and end point at [0.029, 0.1754]. 4. Arc 2: Start point at [0.029, 0.1754], mid point at [0.0714, 0.1403], and end point at [0.029, 0.1052]. The loop should be closed, meaning that the end point of the last curve should be the same as the start point of the first curve. Extrusion Extrude the sketch along the normal direction by 0.0357 units and do not extrude in the opposite direction. Scale the sketch by a factor of 0.75 and set the operation to "NewBodyFeatureOperation". This will create a new solid body based on the sketch. Part 2: Cylindrical Object with a Tapered Top and Flat Bottom Construct a cylindrical object with a tapered top and flat bottom. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: euler angles = [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] and translation vector = [0.0179, 0.0357, 0.125]. Sketch Create a new sketch with a single face and a loop. Within the loop, create a circle with its center at [0.0179, 0.0179] and a radius of 0.0179. Extrusion Extrude the sketch along the normal direction by 0.0357 units and do not extrude in the opposite direction. Scale the sketch by a factor of 0.0357 and set the operation to "JoinFeatureOperation". This will add material to the existing model. Final Model The final model is a rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole on one of its faces. The prism is centered on the x-axis and is slightly tilted on the y-axis. The hole is located on the right side of the prism. The dimensions of the prism are approximately 2 units in length, 1 unit in width, and 0.5 units in height. The hole has a diameter of 0.5 units.</description>
